create.title: Add New Organizer
create.subtitle: Register event organizers to enable bib resale functionality for their races

basicInformation.title: Organizer Information
basicInformation.description: Enter the basic information about the event organizer to identify which races will be available for bib resale on the platform.

form.partnerDescription: Check this option to allow bib resale for events organized by this organizer. This will make their events available on the Beswib marketplace.

success.title: Organizer Added Successfully!
success.message: The organizer "{organizerName}" has been added to the platform. Their events will now be available for bib resale management.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.websiteInvalid: Please enter a valid website URL
errors.createFailed: Failed to add organizer. Please try again.

create.title: Ajouter un Organisateur
create.subtitle: Enregistrer les organisateurs d'événements pour activer la revente de dossards sur leurs courses

basicInformation.title: Informations Organisateur
basicInformation.description: Saisissez les informations de base sur l'organisateur d'événements pour identifier quelles courses seront disponibles pour la revente de dossards sur la plateforme.

form.partnerDescription: Cochez cette option pour permettre la revente de dossards pour les événements organisés par cet organisateur. Cela rendra leurs événements disponibles sur la marketplace Beswib.

success.title: Organisateur Ajouté avec Succès !
success.message: L'organisateur "{organizerName}" a été ajouté à la plateforme. Leurs événements seront maintenant disponibles pour la gestion de revente de dossards.

errors.nameRequired: Le nom de l'organisateur est requis
errors.emailInvalid: Veuillez entrer une adresse email valide
errors.websiteInvalid: Veuillez entrer une URL de site web valide
errors.createFailed: Échec de l'ajout de l'organisateur. Veuillez réessayer.

create.title: 주최자 추가
create.subtitle: 이벤트 주최자를 등록하여 대회의 배번 재판매 기능을 활성화합니다

basicInformation.title: 주최자 정보
basicInformation.description: 플랫폼에서 배번 재판매가 가능한 대회를 식별하기 위해 이벤트 주최자의 기본 정보를 입력하세요.

form.partnerDescription: 이 주최자가 주관하는 이벤트의 배번 재판매를 허용하려면 이 옵션을 선택하세요. 해당 이벤트들이 Beswib 마켓플레이스에서 이용 가능해집니다.

success.title: 주최자가 성공적으로 추가되었습니다!
success.message: 주최자 "{organizerName}"가 플랫폼에 추가되었습니다. 이제 해당 이벤트들의 배번 재판매 관리가 가능합니다.
